author: HunteRoi <me@tinaeldevresse.eu> (https://tinaeldevresse.eu)
description: A manager to question people in DM or via a thread channel. Built with DiscordJS.
name: @hunteroi/discord-form

scripts.prepublish: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn build:docs
scripts.start: yarn build && tsc ./examples/index.ts --target esnext --module nodenext --moduleResolution nodenext && node ./examples/index.js
